definitions: remaining hidden so as to wait in ambush

examples.text: the trumpet fish is a lurking predator

shortDefinitions: remaining hidden so as to wait in ambush

definitions: (of an unpleasant quality) present in a latent or barely discernible state, although still presenting a threat

examples.text: he lives with a lurking fear of exposure as a fraud

shortDefinitions: (of unpleasant quality) present in latent or barely discernible state
